mapper.insert: insert into adm_process_flow(form_id, operator_id, action, result, reason, create_time, audit_time, order_no, state, is_last) values(#{formId}, #{operatorId}, #{action}, #{result}, #{reason}, #{createTime}, #{auditTime}, #{orderNo}, #{state}, #{isLast})
mapper.select: select * from adm_process_flow where form_id = #{formId} order by order_no
mapper.update: update adm_process_flow set form_id = #{formId}, operator_id = #{operatorId}, action = #{action}, result = #{result}, reason = #{reason}, create_time = #{createTime}, audit_time = #{auditTime}, order_no = #{orderNo}, state = #{state}, is_last = #{isLast} where process_id = #{processId}
